name: spaceXistential
description:
Description

A metaphoric arcade game about rising up out of depression or something like that. The weird "clouds" are representations of the video games I've made thus far. Use them as stepping stones to reach the goal above. Please feel free to open discussion about the game here. Currently developing a score-based endless arcade version. 

Controls

Arrow Keys

  • Up - Hold to fire main thruster
  • Left & Right - Hold to rotate using side thrusters

Credits
